word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，含义广，指用科学方法对某物质进行测试以估价其性质或效能等。
多指用科学方法在实验室内进行较系统的操作实验以验证、解释或说明某一理论、定理或某一观点等。
指为观察、研究某事物以区别其真伪、优劣或效果等而进行较长时间的试验或试用过程。
普通用词，多用于口语或非正式场合，指试一试。

bilingual.source: What can you learn from this experiment?
bilingual.target: 你能从这个实验中学到什么？

bilingual.source: The kids in my class are doing an experiment.
bilingual.target: 我班上的孩子们正在做一个实验。

bilingual.source: Do the experiment under the instructions of a teacher.
bilingual.target: 在老师的指导下进行实验。

bilingual.source: Where is the experiment being carried out by the students?
bilingual.target: 学生们在哪里进行实验？

bilingual.source: People are amazed at and inspired by Franklin's experiment.
bilingual.target: 人们对富兰克林的实验感到惊奇和启发。

bilingual.source: Scientists question what really happened in Franklin's experiment.
bilingual.target: 科学家质疑富兰克林实验中到底发生了什么。

bilingual.source: What do you think the results of this experiment will be?
bilingual.target: 你认为这个实验的结果会是什么？

bilingual.source: Do you think it matters that Franklin's experiment might not be true?
bilingual.target: 你认为富兰克林的实验可能不是真的重要吗？

bilingual.source: However, neither the story nor the details of the experiment are entirely true.
bilingual.target: 然而，故事和实验的细节都不完全真实。

bilingual.source: For many years, schools have taught the story of Franklin's lightning experiment.
bilingual.target: 多年来，学校一直在教授富兰克林闪电实验的故事。

list.abstract: experiment（英 [ɪkˈsperɪmənt]，美 [ɪkˈsperɪmənt]），英语单词，作名词用，为实验；试验。作动词用，为做实验；进行试验。短语搭配有thought experiment（思维实验），例句为“They put up with the experiment.（他们忍受了这个实验）”。 experiment不及物动词类近义词有have a try、try one's hand，名词类近义词有stroke、proof、try等，名词形式为experimentation、experimentalism。

yingyinNormal.en: Really? We're going to do an experiment?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们去做实验？

yingyinNormal.en: This is a fantastic opportunity for experiment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一个绝佳的做实验的机会。

yingyinNormal.en: You tampered with my experiment? We had to.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们篡改了我的实验？我们别无选择。

yingyinNormal.en: A hero? Like you? You're a laboratory experiment, Rogers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 英雄？像你一样？你不过是个实验品，罗杰斯。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not an experiment! You saw what happened last night.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那不是实验！再说你昨晚也见到会发生什么了。

yingyinNormal.en: Interesting hypothesis. Let's apply the scientific method, perform an experiment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这假设有意思，套用科学的方法做实验证明吧。

yingyinNormal.en: So then I started looking at an experiment that would temp people to steal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这启发我设计了一个实验实验中诱惑人们进行偷窃

yingyinNormal.en: In one experiment I walked around the dormitory refrigerators one day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在一个实验中我来到宿舍的冰箱前。

yingyinNormal.en: Are we ready to order? One moment. I'm conducting an experiment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们准备点菜了吗？稍等，我现在正在做一个实验。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, if this experiment is going to be valid, I suggest a neutral environment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果要让这个实验有效，我建议我跟她得住在中立环境。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm going to attempt an experiment that will get you to transfer those feelings to me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我准备尝试一个实验让你将这些情感转移到我身上。

yingyinNormal.en: During the experiment, Jack and Jill would each see their own watch ticking normally.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当这个实验中，杰克和吉尔会看到自己的手表正常的走。

yingyinNormal.en: Experiment complete. Conclusion, I have a sister. This was you? All of this was you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 实验结束。结论，我有个妹妹。这是你干的？都是你干的？！

yingyinNormal.en: Actually, I was thinking about taking the afternoon off so I could work on another experiment with Penny.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我正想下午请个假然后和佩妮做个别的"实验"。

yingyinNormal.en: Despite recent events, I do consider our experiment in cohabitation to have been positive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 撇开最近的事不谈，我的确觉得我们的同居实验得出了正面的结果。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, Farkle, you're a scientist. Let's do an experiment. Ask me without the ring.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，弗科，你是个科学家，我们来做个实验吧。不拿戒指来向我求婚。

yingyinNormal.en: I have devised an experiment that I believe will increase your feelings for me in an accelerated time frame.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我设计了一个实验，我相信这能让你加快对我产生感情。

yingyinNormal.en: Right, what kind of monster would let a German scientist experiment on them to protect their country.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，什么怪胎为了保卫国家会让德国科学家在自己身上做实验呢。

yingyinNormal.en: The focus of his latest experiment was the oldest light in the universe. The faint afterglow of the big bang.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他最新实验关注的就是宇宙中最古老的光。大爆炸的微弱余辉。

yingyinNormal.en: I'd just like to say that I'm totally behind this experiment. In fact, I'd very much like to butter your head.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想说我完全赞成这个实验，而且，我还非常想把你的脑袋涂上黄油。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 实验性的；试验性的；尝试性的；实验的；根据经验的；经验上的

examination_example.sentence: For one trial, each participant was shown a pile of pens that the researcher claimed were from a previous <highlight>experiment</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一项试验中，每个参与者都被展示了一堆笔，研究人员说这些笔来自之前的实验。

examination_example.sentence: Radesky cites the "still face <highlight>experiment</highlight>" devised by developmental psychologist Ed Tronick in the 1970s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Radesky引用了发展心理学家Ed Tronick在20世纪70年代设计的“静止面孔实验”。

examination_example.sentence: According to brain-scan <highlight>experiments</highlight>, the demands of so much decision-making quickly become too much for us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据大脑扫描实验，如此多的决策需求很快变得对我们来说太多了。

word_usage.usage:
trial，experiment，test 这些名词均有“试验”之意。
trial是侧重指通过观察、研究某事物以区别事物而进行较长时间的试验或试用过程。
experiment则多指用科学方法在实验室内进行较系统的操作实验以验证、解释某理论或某观点。
test则适用范围广，指用科学方法对某物质进行测试或评估。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: perform a scientific procedure, especially in a laboratory, to determine something

examination_example.sentence: In an <highlight>experiment</highlight>, commuters who talked to nearby strangers found their commute more enjoyable than those who didn't.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一项实验中，与附近的陌生人交谈的通勤者发现他们的通勤比那些不交谈的人更愉快。

examination_example.sentence: An excessive trust in theoretical conviction would have prevented Marconi from persisting in <highlight>experiments</highlight> which were destined to bring about a revolution.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对理论信念的过度信任会阻止Marconi坚持进行注定会带来革命的实验。

examination_example.sentence: Marconi's example demonstrates that theoretical concepts and <highlight>experiments</highlight> complement each other in making progress in science and technology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Marconi的例子表明，理论概念和实验在科技进步中是相辅相成的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Experiment</highlight> results showed that students who were not taught that people can change showed poor stress responses.

examination_example.sentence: As you'll notice in the video, the mice definitely seem uncomfortable at the beginning of the <highlight>experiment</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如你在视频中注意到的那样，老鼠在实验开始时确实很不舒服。

examination_example.sentence: What is the finding of one team of psychologists in their <highlight>experiment</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一组心理学家在他们的实验中发现了什么？

word_usage.usage:
experiment 通常是不及物动词, 后面接 on 或 with。
例如: The students are experimenting on/with a piece of metal.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

adj. 实验性的；试验性的；尝试性的；实验的；根据经验的；经验上的

sense_info_list.en: perform a scientific procedure, especially in a laboratory, to determine something

examination_example.sentence: One of his latest projects has been to make plants glow (发光) in <highlight>experiments</highlight> using some common vegetables.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他最近的一个项目是在实验中用一些普通蔬菜让植物发光。

examination_example.sentence: The student completed this <highlight>experiment</highlight> to make come true what Professor Joseph had said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个学生完成了这个实验，以证实约瑟夫教授所说的。

examination_example.sentence: I expect you to do all the <highlight>experiments</highlight> and keep the results in your lab notebook.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我希望你做所有的实验，并把结果记在你的实验笔记本上。

sense_info_list.en: try out new concepts or ways of doing things

word_usage.usage:
experiment 通常是不及物动词，后面接 on 或 with。
例如：The students are experimenting on/with a piece of metal.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

examination_example.sentence: An <highlight>experiment</highlight> in Switzerland found that some robots had learnt how to lie to each other.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 瑞士的一场实验发现，有些机器人学会了如何互相说谎。

examination_example.sentence: However, the <highlight>experiment</highlight> is a success, since it has proved that it is possible for plants to grow in space.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，这项实验是成功的，因为它证明了植物有可能在太空中生长。

examination_example.sentence: The researchers asked 25 university students to join in their sleep <highlight>experiment</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员请25位大学生参加他们的睡眠实验。

examination_example.sentence: It allows time to <highlight>experiment</highlight> and play.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它允许有时间进行实验和游戏。

examination_example.sentence: We <highlight>experimented</highlight> with type, with illustration and with photos.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们用字体、插图和照片进行了实验。

examination_example.sentence: So they decided to <highlight>experiment</highlight> with animals and test them in spaceflights.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以他们决定用动物做实验，在太空飞行中进行测试。
